code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{isSignedIn:false,userData:null,searchInput:"tech",blogData:null},reducers:{setSignedIn:function setSignedIn(state,action){state.isSignedIn=action.payload;},setUserData:function setUserData(state,action){state.userData=action.payload;},setInput:function setInput(state,action){state.searchInput=action.payload;},setBlogData:function setBlogData(state,action){state.blogData=action.payload;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,setSignedIn=_userSlice$actions.setSignedIn,setUserData=_userSlice$actions.setUserData,setInput=_userSlice$actions.setInput,setBlogData=_userSlice$actions.setBlogData;export{setSignedIn,setUserData,setInput,setBlogData};export var selectSignedIn=function selectSignedIn(state){return state.user.isSignedIn;};export var selectUserData=function selectUserData(state){return state.user.userData;};export var selectUserInput=function selectUserInput(state){return state.user.searchInput;};export var selectBlogData=function selectBlogData(state){return state.user.blogData;};export default userSlice.reducer;
